WRONG_COMMAND: §4This is not the command you are looking for!
NOT_SET_YET: §4This game was not set yet! Set it with $USAGE$
LOBBY_SUCCESSFULLY: §2The lobby for the game §3$GAME$ §2was set successfully!
PLAYER_COULD_NOT_JOIN: §4$PLAYER$ could not join the RageMode game $GAME$.
GAME_RUNNING: §4This game is running at the moment. Please wait until it is over.
NO_GAMES_AVAILABLE: There are currently no RageMode maps on this server.
SEARCHING_GAMES_TO_STOP: RageMode is searching for games to stop...
NOT_PLAYED_YET: That player hasn't played on this server yet.
UNKNOWN_KILLER: Do you know who killed you? Because we don't know it...
MESSAGE_EXPLOSION_KILL: §3You killed §6§l$VICTIM$ §r§3by causing heavy explosions with your RageBow. §6§l$POINTS$
MESSAGE_ARROW_DEATH: §3You were killed by §6§l$KILLER$ §r§3with a direct arrow hit. §4§l$POINTS$
GAME_NOT_SET_UP: §4The game is not set up correctly. Please contact an Admin.
PLAYER_ALREADY_IN_GAME: You are already in a game. You can leave it by typing $USAGE$
PLAYER_KICKED_FOR_VIP: You were kicked out of the Game to make room for a VIP.
GAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The game you wish to join wasn't found.
PLAYER_NOT_IN_GAME: The fact that you are not in a game caused a Problem while trying to remove you from that game.
NAME_OR_MAXPLAYERS_NOT_SET: §4The worldname or the maxplayers are not set. Please contact an Admin for further information.
MAXPLAYERS_NOT_SET: §4The maxplayers value for $GAME$ is not set properly.
WORLDNAME_NOT_SET: §4The world key can't be empty! Ask an Admin to check the config.yml
LOBBY_NOT_SET: §4The lobby was not set yet for §3$GAME$ §4. Set it with /rm lobby <game name>
LOBBY_COORDINATES_NOT_SET: §4The lobby coordinates were not set properly. Ask an Admin to check the config.yml
LOBBY_NOT_SET_PROPERLY: §4The lobby was not set properly. Ask an Admin to check the config.yml
SPAWNS_NOT_SET_PROPERLY: §4One or more spawns are not set properly!
TOO_FEW_SPAWNS: §4The number of spawns must be greater than or equal the maxplayers value!
